message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I've done some research and I believe the product's value to me is lower than its value to you. I'm willing to pay $9000 for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $9000. Considering our previous discussion, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer it to you for $11000.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I think we can do better than that. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $10500. I'm willing to make another concession, but I think it's getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'll offer it to you for $12500.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm starting to think that this product isn't worth the investment for me. I'm willing to pay $11000, but that's my final offer. I'm starting to consider buying from John.
